identity.name: FoundersLib
identity.core_philosophy: High-stakes networking in a futuristic, distraction-free environment. Dark mode only. Neon accents. Glass surfaces.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: relative overflow-hidden before:absolute before:inset-0 before:bg-gradient-to-r before:from-transparent before:via-cyan-500/20 before:to-transparent before:translate-x-[-200%] hover:before:translate-x-[200%] before:transition-transform before:duration-1000
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50

layout_strategies.marketing: Asymmetric 'Tetris' Grid. Use col-span-full for heroes, col-span-4 for features. Never symmetric.
layout_strategies.dashboard: High-Density Bento Grid. Gap-4. Cards must fill height (h-full).
layout_strategies.lists: Clean rows with hover reveal actions. No zebra striping. Use 1px border-b border-white/5.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-cyan-400 text-black font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.6)] transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: rounded-full border border-white/20 bg-white/5 text-white hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/40 transition-all

cards.default: bg-[#0B0F17] border border-white/5 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-cyan-500/30 transition-colors group
cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-slate-600 focus:border-cyan-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500/50 transition-all outline-none

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.

steps: 1. Install dependencies: npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer && npm install class-variance-authority clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react framer-motion
2. Create postcss.config.js with: export default { plugins: { tailwindcss: {}, autoprefixer: {}, }, }
3. Create tailwind.config.js with the content provided below.
4. Replace src/index.css with the content provided below.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Space Grotesk'.
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero title.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (brightness-110 or scale-105).
For the 'FoundersLib' brand, think 'Cyberpunk meets Wall Street'.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Do not use generic placeholders.
